title: Entry Point
description: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.

actionPlatform.title: Action Platform
actionPlatform.description: The high level platform(s) where the Action can be performed for the given URL. To specify a specific application or operating system instance, use actionApplication.

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: The supported content type(s) for an EntryPoint response.

encodingType.title: Encoding Type
encodingType.description: The supported encoding type(s) for an EntryPoint request.

httpMethod.title: Http Method
httpMethod.description: An HTTP method that specifies the appropriate HTTP method for a request to an HTTP EntryPoint. Values are capitalized strings as used in HTTP.

urlTemplate.title: Url Template
urlTemplate.description: An url template (RFC6570) that will be used to construct the target of the execution of the action.
